description: WeKan is a pre-seed/seed stage B2B & Future of Work fund based in New York and Chennai. Unlike most funds, they're very hands-on, helping startups inculcate a product-led growth strategy to raise their Series A. I worked directly with the CTO and CEO as a product engineer & evangelist, respectively.
tasks: Working for eHuddle's (Coach's management platform) engineering team.
Worked for WeKan's website/web app engineering team.
Worked for AdWap's (Watching for a change) engineering team.
Worked for OBE Power's (Charging-as-a-service) engineering team.
Worked for Freedom's (micro-social network) engineering team.
Planned & executed the first cohort focused on B2B & Future of Work startups in 60 days.
Helped in profiling startups for investments and strategic growth.
Laid out the company's digital strategy around product-market fit & product-led growth.
